attributes.action: Stop flights into the UK NOW  from Brazil
attributes.additional_details: Stop the new strain of the virus reaching our country..  Boris says he's worried about it so do something about it !!!
attributes.background: Stop flights into the UK NOW  from Brazil

rejection.details:
As of 15 January, direct flights from Brazil to the UK have been prohibited. Visitors who have been in or transited through Brazil in the previous 10 days cannot enter the UK. See:
https://www.gov.uk/foreign-travel-advice/brazil
